website_summaries.verdict: With a snappy, satisfying keyboard and solid battery life, Microsoft's 13.5-inch Surface Laptop 3 is an excellent ultraportable that gets the basics right.
cons: Could use a few more ports

customer_reviews.title: Overheats whenever the battery is charging
customer_reviews.text: I have read online that this has happened to lots of users. Whenever the computer is connected to the power, it overheats, the fans go crazy, and it does not perform well. Some reported that updates fixed the issue- not in my case. Really disappointed that this would happen in a new product, to so many people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Everything else is top notch except the battery life. For something so expensive you would guess it works for a day or two non stop but it barely works for 5hours then you have to run to the charger on basic applications like word or Excel. It's almost like a desktop than a portable laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be beat
customer_reviews.text: Small, thin, light, fast and portable. 👍 won’t be going back to Mac. Windows 10 In my opinion, faster and more secure, don't believe all the mac hype machine.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Office standard
customer_reviews.text: At work we've moved everyone onto surface devices. All the hot desks have surface docks, so you can sit anywhere with your mobile device and have the full desktop experience. The latop 3 isn't a huge leap up from the laptop 2, but to be fair the laptop 2 was superb. What it does bring is USB C which opens up another world of docks if you think the standard surface dock is a bit pricey. Aesthetics and build quality are A1.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a Black Friday Deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect. Great style and screen. Be warned though that the keyboard does have some flex in the centre and is more suited to "touch typing" than hammering the keys. If you have the older docking station that plugs into the side then this does not always work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Parvez Khan

customer_reviews.title: Ok mainly but randomly switches off
customer_reviews.text: Is ok but switches off randomly and requires a reset. This seems to be a common problem with surface machines as there is advice on the web for how to get the machine to start again (it’s not obvious).
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, light and very responsive
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch and feel of the keypad and it is a very close rival to the MacBook, but at a third of the price so cannot go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Blurryanimal

customer_reviews.title: No reason given.
customer_reviews.text: There was no English on this laptop. Very disappointed. Sent back the very next day. There was no reason given for this.
customer_reviews.author: Tibble

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this laptop, fast, lightweight, easy installation and set up. Great so far, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very light, so easily portable. Good processing speed, clear graphics and very good battery life. Smaller keyboard has taken a bit of getting used to, as previous laptops were all 17" screen models. But overall very happy with a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Great laptop! Love everything about it! Looked on Which and this was one of the recommended laptops. So pleased research paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Home use, in conjunction with Windows 365. It links very well.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, feels really nice to use, very quick start up, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really bad product. Looks fancy but inferior performance.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop stopper working and it was impossible to turn it on 2 weeks after the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Laptop defective
customer_reviews.text: Laptop MS surface 3, received yesterday, is unfortunately defective. It switches off as soon as Windows loads. I have requested a replacement and will update my review. The laptop is very attractive but I cannot comment on performance yet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Useless laptop - stick to Apple!
customer_reviews.text: From day one, the machine crashes frequently and the battery drains. This is supposed to be my work laptop. Cannot rely on this laptop - it is garbage. I made the switch h from Apple to Microsoft and deeply regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Easy to set up. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stjames97

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin and looks good too
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not used it to it's full potential yet but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Surface laptop
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product that is very user friendly. Whilst not inexpensive, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brannba

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and nice looking computer
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to order and receive this laptop have had my eyes on this one for a while and this was purchased to replace MacBookPro 13" (with crappy keyboard); Surface Laptop ticks all the boxes but have the following deficiencies; 1. Battery life is very poor 2. The charger is not very handy, everything now running off USB-C it would have been great to see USB-C charger 3. Alacantra cover is a good idea but it seems as if it is not pasted properly and will start to peel off Due to the battery life alone I sent it back for refund, Amazon were really helpful
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib

customer_reviews.title: An excellent computer, my only gripe is You can't uninstall Bing.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Microsoft Surface Laptop. Other than the fact that Bing is glued to this computer. I have no problems at all. You can add Microsoft edge on start up with DuckDuckGo, Chrome etc as next page search engines, but You are stuck with Bing down the line. I hate Bing. My personal prejudice. Easy to work around. Overall excellent.
customer_reviews.author: josh garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of issues with this laptop spent 5hours trying to update, where it got really hot and kept getting stuck on updating screen once you restart the laptop it will want to update again where. Second issue I had was that it wouldn't charge. The replacement also had overheating issues...would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: M.Omar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop purchased on prime day with discount and therefore fantastic value. It’s fast with amazing resolution, super lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kboss

customer_reviews.title: Guided by Which
customer_reviews.text: Primarily used for Zoom meetings. Good Picture and sound. Attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: These laptops are terrible! Inferior screen, poor specifications, poor value. Poor stability, lack of updates. My laptop makes me miserable and it cost a fortune! Support is terrible too, they wanted me to send back a charger with an intermittent fault or pay £70 for a new one. Said fault is also very common so poor quality control too. Microsoft clearly don’t believe in their laptops because they take months to release versions of windows updates for them. Firmware updates are few and far between. Buy a Lenovo or Dell for higher screen quality and much better value.
customer_reviews.author: joted

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop - LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite!! This laptop is brilliant. Easy to set up, all I had to do is purchase Office 365 and I was good to go! Used for my writing, I find the touchscreen an added bonus, especially when I want to make the writing / pictures larger when writing/doing research. Thoroughly impressed. It has everything I need. Great also for apps when I just want a little break! It is speedy, good performance, typing comfort, and a pretty decent battery life and it is SO LIGHT! HIGHLY Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle | CrimeBookJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Get a cheap £200 laptop -- it'll outperform this hunk of junk
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at how bad this product is. Terrible wi-fi issues and crushingly s-l-o-w. Even the keyboard layout is terrible, with F1/F2/etc. keys relegated to secondary status -- heaven help you if you want to press 'PgDn' and then F2 in close succession (so, if you spend a lot of time editing spreadsheets, forget it!)
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stonky

customer_reviews.title: Beware thermal throttling
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. It's extremely well built (although the first one I bought had to go back because the surface of one of the keys wore away). It looks better than any macbook and is pretty fast. The only thing to be aware of is in hot weather it overheats like crazy to the extent that even a simple Teams call will make it feel like your laptop has a Pentium Gold Processor and is in battery-save mode.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tempest

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is incredible, i have never used a better laptop. The face recognition is top notch and very accurate and the touchscreen is responsive and easy to use. The material keyboard is really nice and soft to touch and makes the laptop feel premium (which it should at this price). There is little to no flex in the keyboard and the build quality is second to none. Would highly recommend and would choose this over a Macbook any day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price if you need a lightweight yet powerful device
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight laptop I can even do light gaming on it
customer_reviews.author: ali
